name: Fiendish Wings
description: You have great wings capable of bearing you aloft. The wings you gain this way vary, from the bat-like wings common among demons and devils, to the feathered wings of Szurielâ€™s generals, to the stretched-skin membranes of kytons.
prerequisites: Non-native outsider with the evil subtype.
benefit: Your wings grant you a fly speed equal to your base speed with good maneuverability.
